communityPresenterMsg1:
Dear Test01 QA and Test03 QA,

I believe that you already know each other or your firms are already working together. Test01 QA now needs an IP service in United Kingdom and we believe, as usual, that Test03 QA may be able to help with that. I trust that Test01 QA will follow up with details.
